name: Aevum
description:
How to Play

WASD to move, mouse click to interact with the various elements in the map. Scrollwheel to zoom

You have two resources, tards and passengers, you lose when they go to zero.

Tards reporduce base on how many existing Tards you have.

Story

Play to find out!

You're supposed to be a rogue character saving the world and your pockets, but the game isn't done yet :')

ScreenShots

Coming Soon

Praises
"Horrible" - My mum

"Art is dart" - artistic friend

Conclusion

Give it a go and let us know how it is!
